title: Natural Healing Therapies
description: We provide Traditional Chinese and Natural Medicine in Whittier CA to relief back neck, sciatica, migraine headaches, disc disorders, auto accident injuries.
cleaned_text: Traditional Chinese and Natural Medicine Excellent Techniques & Treatment for Stress Relief to Help Achieve a Sense of Emotional Well Being Traditional Chinese Medicine & Natural Medicine are used to treat many conditions from emotional disturbance to digestive complaints as well as respiratory complaints, urinary infections & prostate problems, skin diseases, male/female reproductive system issues, immune weakness, & many other acute & chronic infections & health problems. |Depression||Anxiety||Irritability||Insomnia||Constipation| |Irritable Bowel Many More| Traditional Chinese Medicine & Natural Medicine may also effectively treat many chronic problems including arthritis, fibromyalgia, Parkinson's disease, osteoporosis, liver/gall bladder diseases, cardio-vascular problems, depression, diabetes & it's complications, obesity & weight problems, migraine headaches, and many other health issues. Natural Healing Therapies Address: 13710 Whittier Blvd. Suite 105
